title: Beginning Of Chaos (Part 2)
body:
Beginning Of Chaos (Part 2)

Denis, the person who helped Noah create the formation was standing inside a room. The wounds on his shoulders that were created by Noah were fully healed and he was in perfect condition.

A man wearing the uniform of a healer was sitting in front of him, but the eyes of the healer were lifeless and his body was completely pale, like someone drained all blood from his body.

Denis was paying attention to the small screen that was showing what was happening outside.

When he saw all the participants coming out of the small world his lips curled upwards.

He took out a small round plate from his storage ring and started to infuse his mana into it. Just as he started to infuse his mana, the formation which was engraved underground and was covering the entire field of the stadium activated.

Denis gritted his teeth when the plate started to absorb his mana at rapid speed.
